Test message This blog is being hosted on https://github.com/yusufunlu/blog adress. It can be move to somewhere else though. The blog infrastructure has been taken from Dan Abramov’s this project : https://github.com/gaearon/overreacted.io

Bu blog şu anda https://github.com/yusufunlu/blog adresinde host ediliyor. Bloğu oluşuturan kod altyapısı Dan Abramov’un şu kütüphanesinden alındı : https://github.com/gaearon/overreacted.io

(I don’t know Haskell and friends.)
